q: What is the primary desktop application used for authoring Power BI reports?
Power BI Desktop is free to download and use.
The _____ view in Power BI Desktop is where you build visualizations.
Match Power BI Component:
Which file extension is used for Power BI Desktop files?
Rearrange Workflow:
Which tool is used to clean and transform data before loading it into Power BI?
You can connect to multiple data sources in a single Power BI report.
The _____ pane contains the list of all tables and fields in your data model.
Match Interface Area:
Which language is used for calculating measures and calculated columns in Power BI?
The M language is used in Power Query for data transformation.
A _____ is a dynamic calculation that updates as the context changes.
Rearrange DAX Measure:
Which visualization is best for showing the distribution of a whole into parts?
A Slicer is used to filter data on the report page interactively.
The _____ chart is suitable for showing trends over time.
Match Visual Type:
What is the relationship called where one record in Table A matches many records in Table B?
Power BI automatically detects relationships between tables if names and data types match.
The _____ key is the unique identifier column in a table.
Rearrange Relationship:
which feature allows you to see how a visual interacts with other visuals on the page?
Drill-down allows you to navigate from a higher level of hierarchy to a lower level (e.g., Year to Month).
The _____ text refers to the information shown when you hover over a visual.
Match Interaction:
Which data connectivity mode imports a copy of the data into the Power BI file?
DirectQuery mode queries the underlying data source in real-time for every visual.
The _____ mode allows you to re-use an existing Power BI Dataset or Analysis Services model.
Rearrange Get Data:
Which feature in Power Query removes the first row and uses it as column headers?
You can change data types (e.g., Text to Date) in Power Query.
The _____ step list shows all the transformations applied in Power Query.
Match Transformation:
Which visual property controls the colors used in a chart?
You can add a constant line (e.g., Target Line) to the Analytics pane of a chart.
The _____ visual formatting option allows you to display values on the chart elements.
Rearrange Formatting:
What is the result of publishing a .pbix file to Power BI Service?
A Dashboard makes use of tiles pinned from one or more reports.
The _____ is an organizational container for collaboration in Power BI Service.
Match Service Item:
Which DAX function counts the number of rows in a table?
The CALCULATE function evaluates an expression in a modified filter context.
The _____ function returns the number of distinct values in a column.
Rearrange Simple DAX:
Which feature allows you to group data into bins (e.g., Age ranges)?
Power BI allows you to create your own custom themes (JSON files).
The _____ view allows you to see the data flow and dependencies (Lineage).
Which visual is best used to display a single Key Performance Indicator (KPI) value against a target?
A Stacked Column Chart allows you to compare total values across categories while seeing the breakdown of each total.
The _____ chart displays data as points on a map using latitude and longitude.
Match Visual Use Case:
Which DAX function returns the current date and time?
Rearrange DAX Date:
Which filter type applies to all visuals on the current page?
A Report-level filter applies to all pages in the report.
The _____ pane allows you to add specific filters to visuals, pages, or the entire report.
Match Filter Scope:
Which Power Query transformation changes distinct values in a column into new columns?
Unpivot turns columns into rows (Attribute-Value pair).
The _____ transformation swaps rows and columns.
Rearrange Unpivot:
Which function handles blank values by providing an alternative result?
The DIVIDE function in DAX is safer than using '/' because it handles division by zero.
The _____ function checks if a value creates an error.
Match Math Functions:
Which property allows you to add an action (like Bookmark navigation) to an image?
Buttons can be used for page navigation, bookmarks, and Q&A.
The _____ helps you save the current state of a report page (filters, slicers, visibility).
Rearrange Button Action:
Which formatting option allows you to dynamically change the color of a bar based on its value?
You can add data bars and icons directly inside a Table or Matrix visual.
The _____ painter tool copies the formatting from one visual to another.
Match Formatting:
Which built-in visual allows users to ask questions about data in plain English?
The Key Influencers visual helps you understand the factors that drive a metric.
The _____ visual automatically generates a text summary of your report data.
Rearrange Q&A:
Which data type in Power Query represents a True/False value?
In Power Query, 'ABC' icon indicates a Text data type.
The _____ menu allows you to choose columns to keep or remove.
Match Data Type Icon:
Which storage mode allows a table to have both Import and DirectQuery partitions (advanced)?
Dual storage mode allows a table to act as either Import or DirectQuery depending on the query.
The _____ model allows you to combine data from different source groups (e.g., Power BI Dataset + Excel).
Rearrange Storage Mode:
Which DAX function returns the related value from another table (like VLOOKUP)?
RELATED works only if a relationship exists between the tables.
The _____ function performs a lookup without a physical relationship.
Match DAX Text:
Which DAX function modifies the filter context for a calculation?
The ALL function returns all the rows in a table, or all the values in a column, ignoring any filters that might have been applied.
The _____ function is typically used inside CALCULATE to return a subset of a table.
Match DAX Filter:
Which time intelligence function calculates a running total for the year?
Rearrange CALCULATE Syntax:
Which function returns a set of dates shifted one year back in time?
Time Intelligence functions require a properly marked Date table.
The _____ function shifts dates by a specified interval (e.g., -1 Month).
Match Time Function:
In a data model, what is an 'Inactive Relationship'?
o: A relationship that is not used by default
A relationship between two hidden tables

q: You can use the USERELATIONSHIP function in DAX to activate an inactive relationship for a specific calculation.
A _____ schema is the recommended design for Power BI data models (Fact table surrounded by Dimension tables).
Rearrange USERELATIONSHIP:
Which feature in Power Query allows you to create a variable that can be used in multiple queries?
Reference query creates a new query that is linked to the original query's output.
The _____ option in Power Query stops a query from being loaded into the data model.
Match PQ Feature:
Which visual allows you to drill through to a detailed report page by right-clicking a data point?
A drillthrough target page must have the drillthrough field added to its 'Drillthrough' well.
The _____ button type automatically navigates back to the previous page.
Rearrange Drillthrough Setup:
Where can you find and import custom visuals created by the community?
Certified custom visuals are verified by Microsoft for security and performance.
The _____ chart is useful for visualizing project timelines (Gantt).
Match Visual Source:
Which join kind in Power Query keeps all rows from the first table and matching rows from the second?
Merge Queries combines columns from two tables based on a common key.
The _____ operation in Power Query combines rows from two tables (stacking them).
Rearrange Merge Queries:
Which data profiling tool in Power Query shows the distribution of values in a column?
Column Quality shows the percentage of Valid, Error, and Empty values.
The _____ profiling option provides detailed statistics (Min, Max, Average) for a selected column.
Match Profiling Tool:
Which type of slicer allows you to filter a date range using a slider?
Relative Date slicer allows filtering for 'Last 3 Months'.
The _____ slicer style shows items in a horizontal orientation (like buttons).
Rearrange Slicer Type:
Which AI visual breaks down a value across multiple dimensions to find the highest contributing factors?
The Decomposition Tree visual supports AI splits (High Value, Low Value).
The _____ visual allows you to type natural language questions to generate charts.
Match AI Feature:
Which role in Power BI Service allows a user to edit content in a workspace?
A Viewer role can only view and interact with reports but cannot edit them.
The _____ role is the highest level of permission in a workspace (can manage access).
Rearrange Workspace Roles:
Which function is used to create a calculated table?
o: Any table function (e.g., FILTER, ALL, SUMMARIZE)

q: SUMMARIZE function groups data by specified columns and calculates aggregates.
The _____ function creates a one-column table with a sequence of numbers.
Match Table Function:
Which security feature allows you to restrict data access for different users based on their role?
Static RLS involves defining roles with fixed filter rules (e.g., [City] = "London").
The _____ feature in Power BI Desktop allows you to test RLS roles.
Match RLS Type:
Which Power BI feature allows you to bundle related reports and dashboards for distribution to a large audience?
Rearrange RLS DAX:
Which data storage mode allows you to leave data in the data source while caching aggregates for performance?
Aggregations can significantly improve query performance over large DirectQuery datasets.
The _____ mode allows mixing Import and DirectQuery tables in the same model.
Match Storage Mode:
Which Power BI Service feature allows you to prepare and clean data in the cloud to be reused across multiple datasets?
Dataflows entities are stored in Azure Data Lake Storage Gen2.
A _____ allows Power BI Service to access on-premises data sources.
Rearrange Dataflow:
Which report view allows you to optimize the layout for mobile devices?
Visuals in Mobile Layout are independent copies; deleting them there deletes them from the desktop layout.
The _____ view is optimized for viewing reports on smartphones in portrait mode.
Match Mobile Feature:
Which DAX function takes a table and applies filters to it, returning a table?
CALCULATETABLE evaluates a table expression in a modified filter context.
The _____ function is an iterator that sums up an expression for each row in a table.
Rearrange Iterator:
Which feature allows you to subscribe to emails of report pages?
Data Alerts can be set on cards and gauges in dashboards to notify you when data changes beyond limits.
The _____ feature allows you to comment on a specific visual in Power BI Service.
Match Notification:
Which DAX function returns the last date in the current context?
FIRSTNONBLANK returns the first value in the column that is not blank.
The _____ function returns the last value in a column, filtered by the last date.
Rearrange Semi-Additive:
Which visual property creates a hierarchy on the axis (e.g., Year > Quarter > Month)?
You can enable 'Show items with no data' to display empty categories in a visual.
The _____ axis allows you to have two different scales on the same chart (e.g., Line and Column).
Match Chart Axis:
Which feature helps improve the performance of a report by analyzing visual rendering time?
Performance Analyzer can export the results to a JSON file.
The _____ Diagnostics tool in Power Query helps you understand what the mashup engine is doing.
Rearrange Performance:
Which custom visual setting allows it to be saved within the report file?
o: It is always saved in the file

q: Organization visuals are custom visuals deployed by the admin to the organization.
The _____ file extension is used for custom visual files.
Match Visual Mgmt:
Which Power Query function is used to convert a list of values into a table?
M is a case-sensitive language.
The _____ bar in Power Query shows the M code for the current step.
Rearrange M Code:
Which relationship cardinality is used when both columns contain unique values?
Bi-directional cross-filtering allows filters to flow in both directions between tables.
The _____ Integrity property is used to hide the blank row in relationships if referential integrity violations exist.
Match Cardinality:
Which DAX function calculates the rank of a value in a list of values?
RANKX requires a table and an expression to evaluate for ranking.
The _____ function returns the top N rows of a table according to a specified expression.
Match Ranking:
Which relationship type allows multiple rows in one table to relate to multiple rows in another table?
Many-to-many relationships normally require a bridge table to resolve ambiguity.
A _____ dimension creates multiple roles (e.g., Order Date vs Ship Date) from a single physical table.
Rearrange Rank Logic:
Which function in Power Query handles errors by replacing them with a specified value?
Power Query can buffer a table in memory using Table.Buffer.
The _____ keyword is used in M to define a variable block.
Match M Basics:
Which map visual allows you to use Esri's global demographic data?
You can use R or Python scripts to create advanced custom visuals in Power BI.
The _____ visual shows the distribution and outliers of a dataset (box and whisker plot).
Rearrange R Script:
Which gateway mode allows multiple users to share a connection to on-premises data?
The Personal Gateway runs as an application on your laptop and is tied to your account.
A _____ refresh updates the data in the Power BI Service based on a schedule.
Match Gateway:
Which DAX function removes all context filters from columns except filters that have been applied to the specified columns?
ALLSELECTED removes context filters from columns and rows in the current query, while converting all other context filters to explicit filters.
The _____ function modifies how filters are applied while evaluating a CALCULATE function (it preserves existing filters).
Rearrange ALLEXCEPT:
Which tool in Power BI Desktop helps identify unused columns to reduce model size?
o: None (External tools like DAX Studio / VertiPaq Analyzer are needed)

q: Disabling 'Auto Date/Time' options can significantly reduce the file size of your model.
The _____ engine is the in-memory columnar database engine used by Power BI.
Match Optimization:
Which DAX function returns the current user's email address (Principal Name)?
In Power BI Desktop, USERNAME() often returns 'DOMAIN\User', while in Service it returns Email.
The _____ function checks if a column is filtered directly.
Rearrange User Check:
Which Power Query function is used to add a new column based on custom logic?
You can invoke a custom function for each row in a table to generate a new column.
The _____ keyword is used to handle exceptions in 'try' blocks in M.
Match M Error:
Which visual interaction setting prevents one visual from filtering another?
Sync Slicers allows a slicer on one page to filter visuals on other pages.
The _____ pane allows you to toggle the visibility of visuals on the page.
Rearrange Interactions:
Which function allows you to calculate the year-over-year growth?
ParallelPeriod is similar to SAMEPERIODLASTYEAR but allows specifying the number of intervals (e.g., -2 Years).
The _____ function returns a table of dates for the current quarter.
Match Period Func:
Which data connector allows querying Azure SQL Database?
You can input a direct SQL statement when connecting to a SQL database in Power Query.
The _____ dialog allows you to enter credentials for a data source.
Rearrange SQL Query:
Which DAX function evaluates an expression across a table and returns the result?
EARLIER is used in nested row contexts to access the value of a column in an outer row context.
The _____ function calculates the median of a column.
Match Iterator:
Which DAX function calculates the distinct count of values in a column, including the blank value?
DISTINCTCOUNTNOBLANK computes the count of distinct values excluding the blank value.
The _____ function counts the numbers in a column.
Match Count Func:
Which feature allows you to control which users see which data rows?
RLS filters are applied at the data model level.
The _____ function creates a virtual relationship between two tables (active relationship).
Rearrange TREATAS:
Which visual property allows you to customize the title based on a measure?
You can use the 'fx' button in the title settings to set the title text dynamically.
The _____ feature allows you to group pages in the navigation pane.
Match Title Dynamic:
Which Power Query function splits a list into a list of lists?
Power Query steps are recorded in the 'Advanced Editor' as M code.
The _____ function removes leading and trailing whitespace from text.
Rearrange Text Clean:
Which chart type is best for showing a running total?
A Waterfall Chart shows how an initial value is affected by a series of positive and negative values.
The _____ visual is excellent for finding outliers in your data.
Match Chart Analysis:
Which DAX function returns the parent of a calculated column in a hierarchy?
PATH function returns a delimited text string with the identifiers of all the parents of the current identifier.
The _____ function looks up a value in a parent-child hierarchy.
Rearrange Hierarchy Path:
Which Power BI Service feature allows you to certify a dataset as authoritative?
Certified datasets are displayed prominently when users search for data in Power BI.
The _____ endorsement means the content is ready for use by others but not officially certified.
Match Endorsement:
Which DAX function creates a virtual table with selected columns?
ADDCOLUMNS adds calculated columns to a given table or table expression.
The _____ function returns a one-row table containing the context values for each column.
Rearrange Select Cols:
Which visual element allows you to navigate to different bookmarks using buttons?
A Page Navigator automatically creates buttons for each page in your report.
The _____ pane allows you to group visuals to apply bookmarks to specific groups.
Match Navigator:
Which Power Query function parses JSON content?
Web.Contents is used to retrieve data from a URL (e.g., API).
The _____ function parses XML content.
Rearrange JSON Parse:
Which Analysis Services feature allows you to group measures into folders?
Perspectives allow simplify the data model by hiding tables and columns for specific user groups.
The _____ string defines the connection parameters (Server, Database, Auth).
Match Model Feature:
Which DAX function allows you to use a relationship that doesn't exist in the model for a calculation?
CROSSFILTER allows you to change the cross-filter direction of a relationship during a calculation.
The _____ function allows passing an expression to be evaluated for each row in a table.
Rearrange CROSSFILTER:
Which DAX function returns the end of the month for the specified date?
EOMONTH can return dates in future or past months by specifying the 'months' argument.
The _____ function returns the last date of the month in the current context.
Match Month Func:
Which visual allows you to display a value within a specific range (e.g., Min, Max, Target)?
A Gauge chart can only accept one target value.
The _____ visual displays a value and its progress towards a goal with a trend line.
Rearrange Gauge Data:
Which Power Query transformation creates a new table by grouping rows sharing a common value?
Group By allows you to perform operations like Sum, Average, or Count on the grouped rows.
The _____ option in Group By allows you to return all rows in the group as a nested table.
Match Grouping:
Which DAX function checks if a value exists in a column or table?
The IN operator checks if a value is present in a list of values.
The _____ function returns TRUE if a specific column is being filtered.
Rearrange CONTAINS:
Which map visual allows you to visualize flow or movement between locations?
A Heat Map shows the density of data points in a specific area.
The _____ map visual uses bubbles to represent data values at specific coordinates.
Match Map Type:
Which performance feature allows Power BI to intelligently aggregate data to improve query speed?
Incremental Refresh works by partitioning the table into historical and current data ranges.
The _____ mode allows users to build reports on datasets they don't have write access to (using Composite models).
Match Perf Feature:
Which DAX function returns the current username in the format 'Domain\User'?
USEROBJECTID returns a unique identifier for the current user in Azure AD.
The _____ function returns the culture code of the current user (e.g., 'en-US').
Rearrange RLS Filter:
Which Power Query feature allows you to see the distribution of values in a column?
Data Type Detection attempts to automatically identify the data type of each column.
The _____ quality bar shows valid, error, and empty percentages.
Match PQ View:
Which visual allows you to display hierarchical data as a set of nested rectangles?
Treemaps are good for displaying large numbers of categories.
The _____ chart connects a series of data points with a continuous line.
Rearrange Treemap:
Which DAX function creates a date from year, month, and day integers?
DATEVALUE converts a date in text format to a date in datetime format.
The _____ function extracts the day number from a date.
Match Date Part:
Which visual property controls the transparency of a background image?
You can use the 'Fill' property to set the background color of a visual.
The _____ enables users to focus on a specific visual by expanding it to fill the canvas.
Rearrange Formatting:
Which DAX function returns the arithmetic mean of all the numbers in a column?
AVERAGEA handles non-numeric values (like text which evaluates to 0).
The _____ function calculates the average of a set of expressions evaluated over a table.
Match Average:
Which visual property allows you to add a constant line to a chart (e.g., target or average)?
The Analytics pane is available for all visual types.
The _____ line in the Analytics pane shows the predicted future values based on historical data.
Match Analytics Line:
Which DAX function calculates the standard deviation of a sample?
STDEV.P calculates the standard deviation for the entire population.
The _____ function returns the variance of a sample.
Rearrange Statistics:
Which Power Query function is used to combine multiple files from a folder?
When combining files, Power Query automatically creates a sample file transformation to apply to all files.
The _____ button in the Content column allows you to combine files in a folder.
Match File Func:
Which visual allows you to display a single value with a trend indicator?
A Top N filter can be applied to showed the top 5 items in a bar chart.
The _____ Visual allows you to see the steps contributing to a net change (Waterfall).
Rearrange Top N:
Which DAX function creates a table from a list of values provided in the formula?
DATATABLE allows you to hardcode data directly into your DAX measure (or calculated table).
The _____ function returns the calendar table based on the min and max dates in a column.
Match Table Gen:
Which feature allows you to see how your report performs on a mobile device?
You can create mobile-specific visual formatting in Power BI Desktop.
The _____ app is used to view Power BI reports on iOS and Android devices.
Rearrange Mobile:
Which DAX function returns the value of a column in the row that is previous to the current row?
Window functions like OFFSET, INDEX, and WINDOW simplify calculations over a set of rows (like running totals or moving averages).
The _____ function returns the value at a specific position in a partition.
Match Window Func:
Which chart allows you to show the composition of a whole using proportional areas?
A Funnel chart is useful for visualizing a process with stages.
The _____ chart combines a column chart and a line chart.
Rearrange Combo:
Which DAX function returns true if the current row is empty?
ISBLANK checks if a scalar value creates a blank.
The _____ function checks if a table is empty.
Match Blank Check:
Which data connectivity mode creates a live connection to an Analysis Services model?
In Live Connection mode, you cannot create new tables or columns using Power Query.
The _____ mode connects directly to the source data without importing it (for databases like SQL, Oracle).
Rearrange Connection:
Which DAX function creates a parent-child path for a hierarchy?
PATHLENGTH returns the number of parents in the path.
The _____ function returns a specified item from the path.
Match Path Func:
Which DAX function calculates the internal rate of return for a schedule of cash flows?
XNPV returns the net present value for a schedule of cash flows.
The _____ function calculates the geometric mean of a column.
Match Financial Func:
Which DAX function returns a table with a single row containing the values from the current context?
VALUES returns a one-column table that contains the distinct values from the specified column.
The _____ function returns a table that represents a subset of another table or expression.
Rearrange ROW:
Which Power Query function is used to create a custom column that invokes a function?
The Keyword 'each' is used to iterate over rows in Power Query.
The _____ operator is used to access a field in a record in M (e.g., [Field]).
Match M Syntax:
Which visual allows you to display data in a calendar format?
You can use a Matrix visual to simulate a calendar by using Day of Week on Columns and Week Number on Rows.
The _____ visual is designed to show the flow of data from one stage to another (Sankey).
Rearrange Matrix Calendar:
Which DAX function returns the result of an expression evaluated for each row in a table, then summed?
SUMX iterates row by row, evaluates the expression, and then sums the results.
The _____ function concatenates the result of an expression evaluated for each row in a table.
Match Iterators:
Which data modeling feature allows you to create a group of measures to be displayed in a single visual with a slicer?
Calculation Groups require an external tool like Tabular Editor to create.
The _____ Parameter feature allows you to dynamically change the dimensions or measures used in a visual.
Rearrange Calculation Item:
Which DAX function returns the value of a measure as it determines the value of a calculation item?
SELECTEDMEASURE can only be used within Calculation Groups.
The _____ function format allows you to dynamically format the selected measure.
Match Calc Group Func:
Which Data View feature allows you to inspect the data distribution of a column in Power BI Desktop?
You can rename tables and columns directly in the Data View.
The _____ bar in Data View shows the number of rows in the table.
Rearrange Rename:
Which DAX function checks if a value is contained within a table?
The 'IN' operator allows for checking if a value belongs to a set of values: 'Value IN {A, B, C}'.
The _____ function returns true if the table is empty.
Match Membership:
Which visual property allows you to add alternate text for screen readers?
Tab order allows you to control the order in which visuals are selected when pressing Tab.
The _____ pane allows you to set the Tab order of visuals.
Rearrange Accessibility:
Which DAX function returns the rank of a value within the current context?
RANK.EQ returns the ranking of a number in a list of numbers.
The _____ function returns the sample covariance of two columns.
Match Statistical:
Which Power Query function generates a list of numbers?
List.Dates generates a list of date values.
The _____ function generates a list of values given four functions (initial, condition, next, selector).
Rearrange List Gen:
Which DAX function calculates the distinct count of values in a column, excluding the blank value?
Data types in Power BI models can affect performance; 'Whole Number' is more efficient than 'Text'.
The _____ function returns a table with a single row if the filter context results in a single value, otherwise blank.
Match Selection:
Which Power Query function lists the names of files in a folder?
You can disable data preview in Query Editor to improve performance while designing queries.
The _____ button allows you to view the dependencies between queries.
Rearrange Query View:
Which visual allows you to display a value against a target using a circle?
You can customize the start scale, end scale, and target value of a Gauge chart.
The _____ visual allows displaying text and images in a customizable free-form layout (Custom Visual).
Match Gauge:
Which DAX function returns the last date of the quarter?
STARTOFQUARTER returns the first date of the quarter in the current context.
The _____ function shifts a set of dates specified by a number of intervals.
Rearrange Qtr End:
Which feature allows you to define a default view for a report (slicers, filters)?
Persistent Filters are enabled by default in Power BI Service.
The _____ feature allows you to revert all filters and slicers to the original published state.
Match User State:
Which DAX function calculates the product of values in a column?
PRODUCTX calculates the product of an expression evaluated for each row in a table.
The _____ function returns the absolute value of a number.
Rearrange Math:
Which Power Query function is used to create a record?
Records in M are defined using square brackets [ ].
The _____ function combines two records.
Match M Type:
Which chart allows displaying data across multiple small charts (trellis)?
Small Multiples splits a visual into multiple smaller versions of itself based on a designated field.
The _____ axis on a Scatter chart creates an animation of data over time.
Rearrange Multiples:
Which DAX function returns the current date?
NOW returns the current date and time.
The _____ function returns the year corresponding to a date.
Match DateTime:
Which security feature allows users to edit reports in a workspace but not publish them?
Contributors can publish reports to the workspace if allowed by settings.
The _____ role in a workspace creates a classic 'read-only' experience.
Rearrange WS Perms:
Which DAX function performs division and handles division by zero?
DIVIDE allows specifying an alternate result if denominator is zero.
The _____ function returns the remainder of division.
Match Math Op:
Which Power Query function enables you to group values into buckets?
Column From Examples allows you to provide sample outputs to generate M code automatically.
The _____ function creates a list of values from start to end.
Rearrange Example:
Which text analytics feature in Power BI allows you to extract key phrases from unstructured text?
Key Phrase Extraction requires an AI Insights license (Premium/Premium Per User) or Cognitive Services subscription.
The _____ function is used to detect the language of a text column.
Match AI Insight:
Which DAX function returns the current row's rank based on a specific column value, handling ties by skipping ranks?
RANKX(Table, Expression, [Value], [Order], [Ties]) - 'Skip' is the default behavior for ties.
The _____ tie breaker method assigns the same rank to tied items and the next rank is consecutive (1, 2, 2, 3).
Rearrange RANKX:
Which chart type is best for showing the correlation between two numerical variables?
A Scatter Chart can use a third variable to determine the size of the bubbles.
The _____ axis on a Scatter Chart can play the data over time.
Match Scatter:
Which Power Query function is used to invoke an API for each row in a table?
Using Function.InvokeAfter allows you to add a delay between API calls to avoid rate limiting.
The _____ option ensures that the query waits for the previous step to complete before running.
Rearrange Web Call:
Which security feature allows you to use Microsoft Information Protection labels in Power BI?
Sensitivity labels persist when data is exported to Excel or PDF.
The _____ admin setting controls whether users can apply sensitivity labels.
Match Security:
Which DAX function creates a table by calculating the cross join of two or more tables?
CROSSJOIN returns the Cartesian product of all rows from all tables in the arguments.
The _____ function evaluates a table expression for each row in the first table and joins the results.
Rearrange CrossJoin:
Which Service feature allows you to see the query performance of your report visuals?
The Usage Metrics Report provides insights into views and unique viewers of your report.
The _____ capacity metrics app helps admins monitor Premium capacity usage.
Match Admin:
Which Power Query function is used to handle multiple replacement values in a single step?
List.Accumulate iterates over a list and accumulates a result (like a reduce function).
The _____ function is used to find text positions.
Rearrange Accumulate:
Which visual allows you to embed a Power App directly into your report?
The Power Apps visual can pass data from the Power BI report to the App.
The _____ visual allows you to trigger a flow directly from a Power BI report.
Match Integration:
Which DAX function allows you to get the value of a column from the last available date?
CLOSINGBALANCEMONTH evaluates the expression at the last date of the month in the current context.
The _____ function evaluates the expression at the first date of the month.
Match Balance:
Which feature in Power BI Service allows you to create an email subscription that sends a full PDF of the report?
Pro users can subscribe others to a report only if the recipients also have a Pro license (or if content is in Premium).
The _____ feature allows external users (Guests) to access Power BI content in your tenant.
Rearrange Subscription:
Which DAX function calculates the ratio of a part to the whole?
ALLSELECTED is often used in ratio calculations to respect visual filters while ignoring row context for the denominator.
The _____ function is useful for calculating the % of Grand Total.
Match Ratio logic:
Which Power Query function allows you to get data from a specific HTML table on a web page?
Web.BrowserContents retrieves the HTML source of a webpage.
The _____ function extracts text between delimiters.
Rearrange Text Extract:
Which text analytics feature in Power BI allows you to identify positive or negative sentiment in text data?
Sentiment Analysis returns a score between 0 (Negative) and 1 (Positive).
The _____ visual automatically analyzes your data to explain the increase or decrease in a value.
Match AI Visual:
Which DAX function returns the set of all permutations of a given number of items?
COMBINA returns the number of combinations (with repetitions) for a given number of items.
The _____ function returns the factorial of a number.
Rearrange Math Funcs:
Which specialized chart is used to display project schedules and timelines?
The Gantt Chart visual shows tasks as bars along a timeline.
The _____ visual displays data using a calendar layout.
Match Schedule:
Which Power Query function performs a bitwise AND operation?
Power Query supports bitwise operations like OR, XOR, and NOT.
The _____ function returns the sine of a number.
Rearrange Bitwise:
Which security feature allows you to restrict access to specific visuals on a page?
OLS is configured in external tools like Tabular Editor.
The _____ security restricts data access at the row level.
Match OLS RLS:
Which DAX function calculates the skewness of a distribution?
o: SKEW (Excel only - not native DAX without calculated columns)

q: There is no native SKEW function in DAX; it must be calculated using statistical formulas (Mean, Median, StdDev). (Statement is generally true for standard DAX lists, though some updates add functions)
The _____ function generates a series of numbers within a given interval.
Rearrange Series:
Which Service feature allows you to package dashboards, reports, and datasets for distribution?
Apps allow you to create a custom navigation experience for your consumers.
The _____ allows you to share datasets across workspaces.
Match App Feature:
Which Power Query function is used to create a list of dates?
List.Dates requires a start date, a count, and a duration step.
The _____ function creates a duration value (days, hours, minutes, seconds).
Rearrange Duration:
Which visual allows you to display a value with a circular progress indicator?
The Donut Chart can be used as a progress indicator if you have a 'Completed' and 'Remaining' value.
The _____ visual allows displaying an image that changes based on a data value (using URLs).
answers: Image Grid (or Table with Image URL)

q: Match Progress:
Which DAX function returns the current user's email address?
USERNAME() often returns 'DOMAIN\User' in Power BI Desktop and Email in Service.
The _____ function checks if the current user belongs to a specific security role.
answers: None (Role membership is implicit in RLS)

q: Match User Func:
Which Service feature allows you to connect to on-premises data sources?
The Personal Gateway can only be used by the user who installed it.
The _____ mode allows the gateway to be shared by multiple users.
Rearrange Gateway:
Which DAX function returns the union of two tables?
UNION combines rows from two tables; columns must match in number and order.
The _____ function returns the rows that are present in both tables.
Match Set Ops:
Which Power Query function splits a list into a list of lists (chunks)?
List.Zip combines multiple lists into a list of lists (pairing elements).
The _____ function returns specific items from a list.
Rearrange Zip:
Which DAX function returns the T-distribution?
T.DIST.2T returns the two-tailed Student's t-distribution.
The _____ function returns the inverse of the Students t-distribution.
Match Distribution:
Which Power Query function is used to add a step that invokes a custom function?
o: No specific function (invoke via UI or code)

q: You can turn any query into a function by right-clicking and selecting 'Create Function'.
The _____ keyword introduces error handling in M.
Rearrange Error Handle:
Which visual property allows you to define the sort order of a column by another column?
Sort by Column is crucial for correct sorting of Month Names (Jan, Feb, etc.).
The _____ property allows you to group visuals together in the Selection pane.
Match Sort:
Which DAX function calculates the sample standard deviation of an expression evaluated for each row in a table?
STDEVX.S evaluates the expression for each row and returns the standard deviation of the population.
The _____ function evaluates the expression for each row and returns the variance of the population.
Rearrange Iterator Stat:
Which feature allows you to create a relationship between two tables based on multiple columns?
o: Composite Key (Merge in PQ or Calculated Column)

q: Power BI relationships are based on a single column pair.
The _____ function allows you to use an inactivity relationship for a specific calculation.
Match Relationship:
Which Service feature allows you to certify that a dataset is trusted and authoritative?
Only specific security groups can be authorized to Certify datasets.
The _____ endorsement creates a tag that the content is ready for exploration.
Rearrange Endorse:
Which DAX function helps in debugging by returning the user name who is viewing the report?
Data Lineage view in Power BI Service shows the flow of data from source to dashboard.
The _____ tool in Power BI Desktop helps analyze the performance of visual rendering and DAX queries.
Match Tool:
Which visual allows you to display hierarchical data in a circular layout?
The Sunburst chart is like a multi-level Donut chart.
The _____ chart shows correlations between two numeric variables with a third value determining bubble size.
Rearrange Hierarchy:
